GeneDef.label: healing stomach
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene have archites that synthesize nutrients during the regeneration.

customEffectDescriptions.li: Slowly <color=#8a8ae6>regenerates wounds</color> regardless of the pawn's healing factor.
For <color=#8a8ae6>each wound</color> and <color=#8a8ae6>each regenerated point</color>, <color=#8a8ae6>replenishes</color> the <color=#8a8ae6>hunger</color> bar by 0.01
